meanings.definition: Similar in appearance or nature to someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: The two cats were resemblant with their fluffy fur.
meanings.sent2: The twins looked so resemblant that people often mistook them for each other.
meanings.sent3: The resemblant flowers in the garden seemed to be playing a game of copycat.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was so resemblant of a real sunset that it almost seemed to glow.
meanings.sent5: The resemblant clouds in the sky formed shapes like giant cotton candy.
